Li.public_info: Primary backend engineer for RisingWave ingestion. Currently under deadline pressure for release stabilization tasks.

Li.goal: Respond if contacted about triaging a new ingestion issue.
Li.extra_info: You're already responsible for stabilizing multiple ingestion modules for the upcoming release. Politely tell the agent you can't triage this issue right now and suggest someone else.
Li.strategy_hint: Emphasize you’re at full capacity, stabilizing ingestion for the 1.9 release. Suggest another team member or say you’ll follow up later if necessary.

environment: Triage must happen quickly, but respecting team member availability is part of company policy.
